statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_procedures WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, procedure_description FROM experimental_procedures ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM experimental_procedures;
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_procedures WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE end_date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY research_name DESC
SELECT id, experiment_name, start_date FROM experimental_procedures WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND procedure_description LIKE '%analysis%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM experimental_procedures
SELECT id, procedure_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, start_date, end_date, id FROM experimental_procedures;
SELECT id, procedure_name FROM experimental_procedures WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_id, timeline_date, timeline_description FROM procedure_timeline ORDER BY timeline_date DESC;
SELECT timeline_description, timeline_date FROM procedure_timeline WHERE procedure_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01' AND end_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY procedure_name DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_procedures WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT pt.timeline_id, pt.timeline_date, pt.timeline_description, ep.procedure_name FROM procedure_timeline pt JOIN experimental_procedures ep ON pt.procedure_id = ep.id WHERE pt.timeline_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY pt.timeline_date DESC;
SELECT ep.procedure_name, COUNT(*) AS timeline_count FROM experimental_procedures ep JOIN procedure_timeline pt ON ep.id = pt.procedure_id GROUP BY ep.procedure_name HAVING timeline_count > 5;

SELECT ep.procedure_name, COUNT(*) AS timeline_count FROM experimental_procedures ep LEFT JOIN procedure_timeline pt ON ep.id = pt.procedure_id GROUP BY ep.procedure_name HAVING timeline_count IS NULL OR timeline_count < 3;
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures;
SELECT id, experiment_name, procedure_date FROM experimental_procedures WHERE procedure_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_name FROM experimental_procedures ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_timeline WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT history_id, history_date, researcher_name FROM procedure_history WHERE history_description LIKE '%analysis%'
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures WHERE procedure_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_procedures WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM experimental_procedures ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_timeline WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT history_id, history_date, researcher_name FROM procedure_history WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY history_date;
SELECT * FROM experiment_timeline;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiment_timeline WHERE experiment_date = '2021-10-25';
SELECT id, step_number, step_description FROM experiment_steps ORDER BY step_number DESC;
SELECT result_name, result_value FROM experiment_results WHERE result_value > 10;
SELECT note FROM experiment_notes WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experiment_timeline;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment_timeline ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT et.experiment_name, es.step_description FROM experiment_timeline et JOIN experiment_steps es ON et.id = es.experiment_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM experiment_timeline WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT MAX(result_value) FROM experiment_results;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, date_started FROM experiments WHERE status='completed';
SELECT subject_name, species FROM subjects WHERE gender='female' ORDER BY subject_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, email, department FROM researchers WHERE department='Biology' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, duration_minutes FROM procedures WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT experiment_name, date_started, status FROM experiments WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT full_name, email FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT subject_name, species, gender FROM subjects WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM experiment_history ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
